p.s: The given speech by the British Prime Minister Boris Johnson on the occasion of the COP26 World Leaders' Summit Opening, was delivered on the 1st of November in 2021 and discusses Boris Johnson's idea of the climatclimate crisis and his view of the role of COP26.
Boris Johnson starts his speech by welcoming everybody to COP.
He says, that they all know about the climate crisis and that they learned not to ignore it.
He continues by saying, that COP26 must be the starting point of handling with the climate crisis if they want to have a chance.
He says that money will not be enough, they first have to find projects they can help to de-risk before money should be moved.

Johnson also mentions that they should not talk about what they'll do in 2050 because they will be too old and they have to act now, because the people who will judge them are not born yet and if they do not act now they will never forgive them.
They will know, that COP26 could have been the starting point of fighting against the climate crisis.

Therefore he says, that COP26 cannot be the end of the story and they cannot lead the future generations because they still have the time and technological devices to stop the crisis but only if they start today.
